title: Where is the Masterwork Chest + Key reward on the Legends of Bilgewater missions list?
body:
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-curse-drowned-event

On the list of rewards for completing all the Legends of Bilgewater missions, it mentions "1 Masterwork Chest & Key."  Every other reward on that list is listed as a reward for completing various missions, but none of the missions give a Masterwork Chest.

Is the Masterwork Chest a special reward for completing all of the missions, is it not a reward at all, or was one of the missions left off the list?

replies.body: Masterwork chests are available in the store now. They are just like normal chests, but won't contain champion shards.

...
Not to come off rude, but did you even bother reading?

U right. I misread the question in his title; I thought that was part of it.

I am as bamboozled as the OP about where the chest is as a reward. Can't find it in the list.

It's on there now.

>Blood Drenched Streets
>
>Win 4 games of Bilgewater ARAM
>
>OR
>
>Collect 150,000 gold
>
>Masterwork Chest & Key
